title: panic: on array/collectionFormat + validation
body:
For any collection such panic happens

```
parameters:
  - name: sha256
    in: query
    required: true
    type: array
    items:
      type: string
      minLength: 64
      maxLength: 64
    collectionFormat: multi
```

```

goroutine 18 [running]:
net/http.(*conn).serve.func1(0xc8202f6000)

    /usr/local/go/src/net/http/server.go:2137 +0x44e
```

Root cause:
Generated validation code try to access a slice of sha256 that is still empty.

```
    iValidateElement := func(i int, sha256I string) *errors.Validation {

        if err := validate.MinLength(fmt.Sprintf("%s.%v", "sha256", i), "query", string(o.Sha256[i]), 64); err != nil {
            return err
        }

        if err := validate.MaxLength(fmt.Sprintf("%s.%v", "sha256", i), "query", string(o.Sha256[i]), 64); err != nil {
            return err
        }

        return nil
    }

```
